name: Vegan Banana-Quinoa Bread with Chia Jam
description: This easy vegan banana-quinoa bread with chia jam is perfect for breakfast or a healthy snack in between meals. It's packed with vitamins and antioxidants!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups frozen or fresh berries (I used frozen mixed berries (raspberries, blackberries, cherries, and strawberries))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the quinoa according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the quinoa according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the grated flax seeds and the water in a small bowl and allow to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the grated flax seeds and the water in a small bowl and allow to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the rest of the ingredients in a medium bowl. Stir in the flax seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the rest of the ingredients in a medium bowl. Stir in the flax seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a bread tin with vegan margarine and pour in the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a bread tin with vegan margarine and pour in the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 60 minutes. Allow to cool down before removing it from the bread tin.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 60 minutes. Allow to cool down before removing it from the bread tin.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile make the berry-chia jam: Place the frozen or fresh berries in a small sauce pan and bring to a simmer. Lightly mash the berries with a fork or a potato masher.  Make sure to leave some parts of the fruits intact. Stir in the chia seeds and cook for another 5-8 minutes until the mixture is thick enough.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the banana-quinoa bread together with the berry-chia jam.
